title: Stochastic Variational Inference
description: ğŸŒŸ This comprehensive document delves into the application of Stochastic Variational Inference (SVI) to tokenized ecosystems, focusing on models from AbundanceCoin ICO, Tokenized Economy, and TokenAffiliates program. ğŸ“ˆ SVI revolutionizes traditional variational inference by incorporating stochastic gradient optimization, enabling scalability for massive or streaming datasets. ğŸ” Each section stands independently, meticulously redefining variables and contexts while providing abundant equations detailing the SVI process through mean-field approximation and noisy gradient updates. ğŸ¤– The exploration begins with SVI for estimating bonding curve parameters in AbundanceCoin, using linear price models with noisy observations and prior distributions. ğŸ“Š It advances to analyzing exchange rate dynamics in the Tokenized Economy, modeling prices for multiple tokens and inferring parameters via Bayesian estimation. ğŸš€ Finally, it addresses commission rate impacts in the TokenAffiliates program, handling exponential distributions and variable commission rates with robust probabilistic techniques. ğŸ”¥ Overall, the document demonstrates SVI's powerful capabilities in Bayesian inference for complex tokenized systems.
